Title: The Adventures of Ford Fairlane
Genre: Action, Adventure, Comedy, Crime, Music, Mystery
Writer: Daniel Waters (screenplay), James Cappe (screenplay), David Arnott (screenplay), James Cappe (story), David Arnott (story), Rex Weiner (characters)
Actors: Andrew Dice Clay, Wayne Newton, Priscilla Presley, Morris Day
Plot: A vulgar private detective is hired to find a missing groupie and is drawn into a mystery involving a series of murders tied to the music industry.
